text: Yakshcho vy divorce zhinky, odnoho razu vony fulfill yikhni tymchasovyy, ne zavazhayutʹ yim z remarrying yikhni choloviky, yakshcho vony svyatyatʹ amicably. Tse povynno buty zvazhene na ts sered vas shcho viryte v BOHU ta ostannʹomu Dnyu. Tse ye bilʹsh chyste dlya vas, ta bilʹshe spravedlyvykh. BOH znaye, v toy chas, yak vy ne znayete
